description: Gets a list of build identifiers for the specified build project, with each build identifier representing a single build.

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: The name of the CodeBuild project.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: The order to sort the results in. The results are sorted by build number, not the build identifier. If this is not specified, the results are sorted in descending order. Valid values include: ASCENDING: List the build identifiers in ascending order, by build number. DESCENDING: List the build identifiers in descending order, by build number. If the project has more than 100 builds, setting the sort order will result in an error.

nested_items.name: ids
nested_items.description: A list of build identifiers for the specified build project, with each build ID representing a single build.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If there are more than 100 items in the list, only the first 100 items are returned, along with a unique string called a nextToken. To get the next batch of items in the list, call this operation again, adding the next token to the call.
